    • Patrono

      public Patrono(int userID, String userPASS, String name, ArrayList<Libro> borrowedBooks, Stato state, double saldo)
      class the defines what a patron is with correlated methods
      Parameters:
      userID - the patron id
      userPASS - the patron pass
      name - the patron name
      borrowedBooks - list of the borrowed books
      state - patron state
      saldo - patron money
